description: This file defines the NotesProvider class, which manages the state and business logic related to notes within a Flutter application. It handles note creation, updating, deletion, searching, and initializing the database connection, acting as a state management layer for notes.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that provides notes data and operations such as load, create, update, delete, and search for a Flutter app.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the database and loads all notes, setting the provider as initialized.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refreshes the notes list from the database based on current query.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query and refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with the provided title and content, then refreshes the list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note with new title or content, refreshing the notes list afterward.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID and refreshes the list.
